column5: Director of Resources and Legal Services
column6:
We aim to give our staff the right opportunities, training and development so that they achieve their potential, maximise their productivity and are well motivated. We aim for our staff to be as diverse as the communities and customers we serve.
We will also manage and maintain our buildings and vehicles so that we increase utilisation rates and  ensure that assets are safe and provide value for money. We will provide safe, secure places to work that allow our staff to do their jobs effectively.
